showAllGuides.value: I want to choose a guide.

guideExplanationHeader._context: Header for the guide explanation section

guideExplanationContent.value:
Guides in the Bible Well are designed to help you understand the Bible better. This helps you grow in your understanding of who God is and what he is doing. It also helps you translate the Bible better and make sure that your Bible translation has been done well.

If you want to study the Bible or start translating the Bible, please select "Drafting Guides" below. This will walk you through a process for understanding the Bible and starting to draft your translation.

If you want to check your Bible translation to make sure it was done well, select "Checking Guides" below. There are several options that help you understand the Bible, especially the difficult passages.
guideExplanationContent._context: Explanation of each type of guide so users know what to choose.

description.value: The resource you desire to import, {resourceName}, is released under {licenseType}. This app enables you to import and "mix" this resource with the openly licensed content already in the app. In order to proceed, please acknowledge that you understand the license terms of this resource by clicking the "Accept" button.

header._context: Header for the community edition content modal

description.value:
This content has not been fully checked for accuracy. A community member translated it, but it hasn't gone through the same review process as other content. Please use it with caution.

Please report any translation errors or suggestions by using the feedback icon in the upper right corner of the window.

If you are interested in becoming a Community Edition contributor, go to Menu > Feedback and let us know.
description._context: Description for the community edition content modal
